short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download Yoto Meeting to enjoy lifelike video conference experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yoto Meeting is a web-based video conference tool for enterprise to a lifelike video experience, which rapidly builds relationships and trust, just like you present in person. With HQ streaming video and audio, Yoto Meeting makes connecting simpler and smoother.

Yoto Meeting features include:
- Easy access to meeting rooms
- Secure meeting environment
- High-quality streaming video
- High-quality VoIP audio
- Multi terminal devices supported
- Collaborative function such as file sharing and presenting
- Adjustable window layout based on numbers of participants
- Complete user manual and instruction video
- 24/7 IT support

Thank you for choosing Yoto Meeting!
